subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Since she hired her French coach, Patrick Mouratoglou, in June 2012, Williams has compiled a 193-14 record, winning 7 of 12 Grand Slam tournaments.
snippet: Since she hired her French coach, Patrick Mouratoglou, in June 2012, Williams has compiled a 193-14 record, winning 7 of 12 Grand Slam tournaments.
